      • fft

        public static Complex[] fft(Complex[] x)

      • fft

        protected static Complex[] fft(Complex[] x,
                               boolean forward)
        FFT from Cormen et al. pseudocode for iterative FFT w/ an inverse ability added. Note that the length of x must be a power of 2.
        Parameters:
        x -
        forward - run the transform in forward if true, else perform inverse transform.
        Returns:

      • ifft

        public static Complex[] ifft(Complex[] x)

      • bitReverseCopy

      • bitReverseCopy

        protected static Complex[] bitReverseCopy(Complex[] x)

      • fft

        public double[] fft(int[] x)
        perform FFT on x using the Cormen et al. pseudocode for iterative FFT. Note that the result cannot be inverted because only the real portion is returned and inverse FFT needs the real and complex components.
